tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RemoteServers (
    server_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Online',
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    storage_usage FLOAT,
    network_traffic FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE network_infrastructure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    performance_metrics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE server_status (
 server_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 server_name STRING,
 server_location STRING,
 status BOOLEAN,
 performance_metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE network_status (
 network_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 network_name STRING,
 network_location STRING,
 latency FLOAT,
 bandwidth FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_log (
 incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 incident_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 incident_description STRING,
 incident_type STRING
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    metric_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    server_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (server_id) REFERENCES servers(server_id)
);

CREATE TABLE server_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    server_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (server_id) REFERENCES servers(server_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ServerStatus (
    server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(10),
    last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ServerMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    storage_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    network_traffic DECIMAL(8,2)
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    bandwidth_usage DECIMAL(8,2),
    packet_loss DECIMAL(5,2),
    latency DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(10),
    last_update TIMESTAMP
)
